meanings.definition: A cutting tool with a hooked blade for pruning or cutting wood.
meanings.sent1: The farmer used billhooks to trim the branches of the fruit trees.
meanings.sent2: I bought a new pair of billhooks for my gardening work.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel tried to use the billhooks to style its tail like a barber.
meanings.sent4: Her words were sharp, cutting through the conversation like billhooks through branches.
meanings.sent5: The gleaming billhooks hung on the shed wall, ready for the next gardening task.

meanings.definition: To cut or prune with a billhook.
meanings.sent1: He carefully billhooks the overgrown bushes in his backyard.
meanings.sent2: She will billhooks the excess branches from the tree to promote healthy growth.
meanings.sent3: The chef decided to billhooks the vegetables into perfect bite-sized pieces.
meanings.sent4: The sculptor billhooks away at the block of wood, revealing the hidden figure within.
meanings.sent5: The sound of billhooks against wood echoed through the quiet forest.
